title: Sum to Product Identity
text: The formula to express the sum of two cosines as a product is as follows: $$cos\left(a\right)+cos\left(b\right)=2cos\left(\frac{a+b}{2}\right) cos\left(\frac{a-b}{2}\right)$$.

title: Identify Unknown Angle a
text: What is the value of the unknown angle a?

title: Identify Unknown Angle $$b$$
text: What is the value of the unknown angle $$b$$?

title: Express as Product
text: To express the sum as a singular product, plug in the identified values of a and $$b$$ and simplify if necessary.
